lead_paragraph: Hungarian education authorities say the government is seeking to review rules about long school trips in light of a January bus crash in Italy that killed 16 people, mostly Hungarian students.
snippet: Hungarian education authorities say the government is seeking to review rules about long school trips in light of a January bus crash in Italy that killed 16 people, mostly Hungarian students....

headline.main: Australia Quicks Need to Bowl Straighter, Says Hazlewood
headline.print_headline: Australia Quicks Need to Bowl Straighter, Says Hazlewood
